hero.title: Hi, I'm Yassine Rafiq
hero.subtitle: Junior Web Developer
hero.description: I create beautiful and functional websites using modern technologies. Passionate about coding and always learning new things.

about.title: About Me
about.heading: Curious Developer & Problem Solver
about.text1: Hello! I'm a passionate junior full-stack web developer, graduated in Digital Development – Full Stack Web Option. I love turning ideas into real applications by building modern, efficient, and user-focused web solutions.
about.text2: Through academic projects and internships, I gained strong front-end and back-end skills using technologies like React, Laravel, Node.js, and MySQL. I enjoy learning new tools, improving my skills, and taking on technical challenges.
about.text3: I am currently looking for opportunities to work on exciting projects and collaborate with great teams.

Didactiques.title: Didactic Resources Management Platform
Didactiques.description: A modern React & Laravel platform that centralizes pedagogical resources and communication for training centers. Includes role-based dashboards, announcements, resource sharing, and online QCM evaluations with automatic correction.

Microservices.title: Plant & Product Management Microservices
Microservices.description: A lightweight microservices project built with Node.js and Docker. It includes separate services for authentication, products, plants, and a client app. Each service runs independently and communicates through internal Docker networking. The plant service also consumes a public API to fetch real plant information.

Plannings.title: Medical Scheduling & Automated Reminder System
Plannings.description: This project is a web application built for the External Consultation Center of CHU Ibn Tofail. It enables the administrator to manage doctors’ schedules, automatically send personalized reminders before appointments, and generate PDF documents from a digital form. The system improves internal coordination and reduces missed consultations.

Automated.title: Google Form Automated PDF Generator (Google Apps Script + TypeScript)
Automated.description: Automated Google Form workflow that collects user responses, generates a personalized PDF, sends it by email, and stores a copy in Google Drive. Built with Google Apps Script and TypeScript.

educationDetails.description: Intensive training in modern web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

job1.title: Frontend Developer Intern
job1.description: Developed responsive web applications and collaborated with the design team to implement user interfaces.

job2.title: Freelance Web Developer
job2.description: Created websites for small businesses and personal projects using modern web technologies.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.messageText: Feel free to reach out to me via email, phone, or LinkedIn. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects.

footer.builtWith: Built with React and lots of ☕
